In #AZ01, uranium mining has a toxic legacy, & many continue to struggle with effects of radiation exposure. This weekend, @RepRaulGrijalva & I announced the Grand Canyon Centennial Protection Act to permanently ban uranium mining near the Grand Canyon. http://bit.ly/2NwJzcV¬†
